ygData.subject: RE: Re: Re: BARD HATE
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think they would put it in purposely, but then again if they can accidentally cause a quest that can only be completed if your faction is ridiculously
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think they would put it in purposely, but then again if they can
accidentally cause a quest that can only be completed if your faction is
ridiculously high (Squad Ring) to reduce you to KoS status when you complete
it, this isn't even a stretch.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 12:47 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Re: BARD HATE
Importance: Low


From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

Assuming bard hate does, in fact, exist (I'm still not totally convinced
that it does) why would Verant put that into the code? It doesn't make
sense.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
